Articles.Content:
Played this on a friends usb stick..was farking amazing. Had to purchase to support the development and developers of this amazing game. After launching many diff types of craft ..i must have 30 lil kerbals in diff orbits. I am ready to get serious and try for the the Mun. As such are there any mods that are must have?

Cya all in Space

GKz

Welcome to the community GraviTykillz

Must have addons? The sub-assembly saver is pretty much essential

Have fun reaching the Mun, and fly safe!
I never even knew that mod existed. I guess I need to increase the time I spend in KSP and decrease the time I spend in blender..

Mods, well here are some that might make the game more fun, epically because your going to the MÃƒÂ¼n.

- Kethane

- ISA Mapsat

- Kerbal Alarm Clock (Helpful)

Those are just some. Check out the spaceport for more. ( I like the chatterer plug-in. Adds some realism. )

Happy Kerbaling!

Hi GraviTykillz loving the name.

Take a look at this thread What-are-some-must-have-mods-you-came-across
Thank you All for the warm welcome!!! And the Sub-Assembley is just what i needed to save my heavy lifter body!..Thanks!
